channel_description: Encounters with Legendary and Mythical Pokémon and challenging tournaments await Ash in Pokémon: BW Rival Destinies, now on Pokémon TV!

media.title: Enter Elesa, Electrifying Gym Leader!
media.description: For Bianca to continue traveling with the gang, Ash must convince her dad she’s ready...even if it means a battle!

media.title: Dazzling the Nimbasa Gym!
media.description: The stakes are high for Ash at the Nimbasa Gym, and our hero isn’t taking any chances!

media.title: Lost at the Stamp Rally!
media.description: Spending the day in Nimbasa City after Ash’s fourth Unova Gym Badge win, Cilan has a special challenge in mind, while our heroes discover a fellow Trainer in need!

media.title: Ash Versus the Champion!
media.description: As our heroes prepare to leave Nimbasa City, they bump into Ash’s rival Trip, who introduces them to someone they had only dreamed of meeting!

media.title: A Maractus Musical!
media.description: On their way to Driftveil City, our heroes meet an enterprising young man with three dedicated friends and a dream!

media.title: The Four Seasons of Sawsbuck!
media.description: Our heroes meet a young Pokémon Photographer on the mission of a lifetime!

media.title: Scraggy and the Demanding Gothita!
media.description: On their way to Driftveil City and Ash’s next Gym Battle, our heroes meet a demanding Gothita with a crush on Scraggy!

media.title: The Lonely Deino!
media.description: On their way to Driftveil City and Ash’s next Gym battle, our heroes come across some very precious Pokémon in a very special place!

media.title: The Mighty Accelguard to the Rescue!
media.description: Ash arrives in Driftveil City only to be confronted with a series of perilous events! It may take a superhero (or two) to crack this case!

media.title: A Call for Brotherly Love!
media.description: While Ash prepares for his upcoming Gym Battle with Clay, a surprise visitor with a dilemma offers both Ash and Cilan the opportunity to help!

media.title: Stopping the Rage of Legends! Part 1
media.description: What started as a trip to Milos Island to find Revival Herbs has turned into a cataclysmic battle of Legendary proportions!

media.title: Stopping the Rage of Legends! Part 2
media.description: In search of scarce Revival Herbs, Ash and friends are now faced with the potential destruction of Milos Island!

media.title: Battling the King of the Mines!
media.description: Our heroes have returned to Driftveil City with the sought-after Revival Herbs, and Ash is eager to battle Gym Leader Clay!

media.title: Crisis at Chargestone Cave!
media.description: Continuing their journey to Mistralton City, our heroes come across Chargestone Cave and a dilemma for its residents!

media.title: Evolution Exchange Excitement!
media.description: After witnessing a dramatic Pokémon trade and Evolution, Ash and his friends’ excitement has just begun!

media.title: Explorers of the Hero's Ruin!
media.description: Professor Juniper’s father has invited our heroes to join him in what he promises will be an exciting adventure...and he keeps his promise!

media.title: Battling the Bully!
media.description: An encounter with Pikachu’s old rival puts our heroes in the middle of a bullying confrontation!

media.title: Baffling the Bouffalant!
media.description: An encounter with some very angry Bouffalant forces our heroes to take some unexpected precautions!

media.title: Cilan Takes Flight!
media.description: Arriving at the Mistralton City Gym, our heroes are shocked to discover a Gym Leader with a battle style they never would have imagined!

media.title: An Amazing Aerial Battle!
media.description: Ash and Gym Leader Skyla are ready to launch into battle! But Ash’s strategies—and Pokémon—may have to evolve for him to be victorious!

media.title: Climbing the Tower of Success!
media.description: After reuniting with two old friends, our heroes prepare to participate in a competition that takes making a wish to a higher level!

media.title: The Clubsplosion Begins!
media.description: Don George’s Clubsplosion Tournament is getting under way, and all our heroes—and their rivals—are ready to compete!

media.title: Search for the Clubultimate!
media.description: Round one of the Clubsplosion Tournament rages on, and the explosive action more than lives up to its name!

media.title: A Clubsplosion of Excitement!
media.description: The first round of the Clubsplosion nears completion, and Round Two promises even more excitement with every match!

media.title: Commanding the Clubsplosion Crown!
media.description: The Clubsplosion Tournament is all about intense head-to-head battling, but the final round will raise the bar even higher!

media.title: Battling the Leaf Thieves!
media.description: As our heroes continue toward Icirrus City, a joyous event precedes a crisis!

media.title: A Restoration Confrontation! Part 1
media.description: As our heroes continue their journey to the Icirrus City Gym, they find themselves deep inside Twist Mountain—and in the middle of another evil Team Rocket plot!

media.title: A Restoration Confrontation! Part 2
media.description: As our heroes battle to save their new Pokémon friends, an entire ancient world is at stake!

media.title: Evolution by Fire!
media.description: Stopping for the night at Don George’s Pokémon Battle Club on the path to Icirrus City, our heroes come across a Trainer with a surprising connection to their past!

media.title: Guarding the Guardian of the Mountain!
media.description: As our heroes near Icirrus City and Ash’s next Gym battle, they find themselves face to face with a star-studded cast!

media.title: Caution: Icy Battle Conditions!
media.description: The chance for Ash to earn his seventh Unova Gym badge is here, and it’s a slippery slope indeed!

media.title: Clash of the Connoisseurs!
media.description: When their travels are disrupted, our heroes are summoned to a place where Cilan’s Connoisseur skills are in high demand!

media.title: Crisis at Ferroseed Research!
media.description: On their way to Virbank City, our heroes run into a familiar face and an icy emergency!

media.title: An Epic Defense Force!
media.description: In Virbank City, an old friend gives our heroes a taste of movie-making they will never forget!

media.title: Rocking the Virbank Gym! Part 1
media.description: Ash’s quest for his eighth Gym badge gets under way—and the battle turns out to be a multimedia event indeed!

media.title: Rocking the Virbank Gym! Part 2
media.description: The battle between Ash and Roxie at Virbank Gym continues to rock! Who will take a bow as victor in front of the rowdy crowd?

media.title: All for the Love of Meloetta!
media.description: An unexpected encounter with an old friend in Virbank City presents our heroes with unexpected challenges!

media.title: Piplup, Pansage, and a Meeting of the Times!
media.description: With Cynthia’s help, our heroes have begun training for the Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup, and a couple of old friends come along for the wild ride!

media.title: Expedition to Onix Island!
media.description: When our heroes take a break from special training, a mysterious island offers much more than they bargained for!

media.title: The Mystery of the Missing Cubchoo!
media.description: As our heroes train for the upcoming Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup, a worried neighbor of Cynthia’s comes by for help!

media.title: Iris and the Rogue Dragonite!
media.description: While our heroes continue preparations for the Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup, a sudden emergency and a Pokémon in need change their lives forever!

media.title: Jostling for the Junior Cup!
media.description: The Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup is off to a roaring start, while our heroes are faced with rivals old and new!

media.title: Battling Authority Once Again!
media.description: The second round of the Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup is off and running, while a battle between the winner and Alder waits in the wings!

media.title: Ash, Iris and Trip: Then There Were Three!
media.description: The exciting Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup continues, and the semi-finals and finals hang in the balance of the results of these last two matches!

media.title: Goodbye, Junior Cup—Hello, Adventure!
media.description: The Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup may be winding down, but new adventures are just beginning!

media.title: The Road to Humilau!
media.description: Our heroes’ new friend Cameron needs to win his eighth Gym badge in order to enter the Unova League, and that sets the stage for an unforgettable adventure!

media.title: Unrest at the Nursery!
media.description: While Ash trains for entry into the Unova League, our heroes discover a Pokémon nursery that urgently needs their help!

media.title: Meloetta and the Undersea Temple!
media.description: A sinister plot to take over the Unova region is taking shape, and our heroes are caught in the middle of it!

media.title: Unova’s Survival Crisis!
media.description: Team Rocket’s “Operation Tempest” is under way with a fierce vengeance, and the fate of the Unova region hangs in the balance!
